channel.title: Problem Logging in
channel.description: There is a problem with my trying to get into my server. I log in and then it says there is an error connecting to your server and it says to go to start server. I do that and then i log in again and my account is supposedly logged in when in fact its not

item.title: Problem Logging in
item.dc:creator: @cashmoney516 cashmoney516
item.description:
@cashmoney516 wrote:

well i havent port forwarded but i was able to log on multiple times without it and edit my server still and im using download client but thanks ill see if i can hack my parents password on the router =p

Read full topic

item.title: Problem Logging in
item.dc:creator: @nicktheman75 nicktheman75
item.description:
@nicktheman75 wrote:

if your using moparscape web client you dont start a server on that.
there can be multiple problems

no JDK
not portfowarded
to protforward you go to command prompt and type in ipconfig
the type in you default gateway into you address on internet explorer enter your username and password then
get your ip address can be found in ipconfig or on the setup page of your router, after this go to applications and gaming enter start and end as 43594 and keep the “both” box as it is. then after it shows you this(example: 192.168.1.(blank) enter your last number of your ip address there then click enable. after this go to security and uncheck the first box then your done portfowarding (: and your server should be up and running!

oh and you need a host from no-ip.com log onto your server using your ip address after this.

Read full topic
